description: This table stores ambulance transport condition codes for claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Claim Info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TRAN_COND_C_NAME
columns.description:
Ambulance transport condition code.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient is confined to a bed or chair


Transportation was to the Nearest Facility


Admitted to a Hospital


Bed Confined Before the Ambulance Service


Bed Confined After the Ambulance Service


Moved by Stretcher


Unconscious or in Shock


Transported in an Emergency Situation


Physically Restrained


Visible Hemorrhaging


Ambulance Service was Medically Necessary
